title: Tetrad: Dark Fantasy Music for Fictional Worlds Bundle
description: 40 Tracks, 133 music assets for fantasy games.
longDescription:
“Tetrad: Dark Fantasy Music for Fictional Worlds” is the full set of music collections previously published HERE and HERE. It includes “Desolate Kingdom”, “Pantheon”, “Chronicle”, and “Arcanist”. This asset pack includes 40 tracks of cinematic orchestral fantasy music and spans 2 hours. Including track variations, this bundle contains 133 music assets. All loops are coded and ready to be incorporated into your project with the new Unreal 5 sample-accurate MetaSounds engine. Intro tracks transition seamlessly into looping tracks without pops or clicks.


Preview the music on Youtube: Desolate Kingdom, Pantheon, Chronicle, Arcanist.

Or listen to the full tracks on Youtube HERE and HERE.


Note: Unreal version 4 assets are available, but will not include MetaSounds. Version 4 will only include .WAV and Sound Cue files. MetaSounds is only included in Unreal 5.0 or later, and must be activated in plugins. Intros must be played before looping segments for assets to work properly.

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  40 fully looping orchestral tracks spanning 2 hours.
  • Including variations, there are 133 usable music assets.
  •  Detailed orchestral music for fantasy settings
  •  MetaSounds codes are included for all loops for seamless intro transitions into looping segments.

Number of Audio Wavs: 186

Number of Audio Cues: 186

Number of MetaSound Sources: 133

Sample rate / bit rate: 16 bit, 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 120

Supported Development Platforms: All

Documentation: Included in Asset Pack

Important/Additional Notes: Use of MetaSounds codes require Unreal Engine 5.0.
